title: Coneheads
review: At first I thought I was in trouble when it became clear it was going to be the same joke over and over. But over time it grew on me. Once I'd tuned into it's sense of humour the stupid faces and squeaks they made started to make me laugh. Chris Farley is surprisingly good in this, although I feel like we should have gotten to know Connie Conehead a little better. I am not sure I could laugh at it again but I enjoyed seeing it once.
